title: Statements about a potential energy position graph

content.prompt: If the total energy of the system is -2.0 J, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: Particle A has 2.0 J of kinetic energy.
The system has 2.0 J of total mechanical energy.
Particle A is always at x = 0.40 m.
Particle A oscillates between x = 0.20 m and 0.65 m.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
